===Cause and prevalance===
===Cause and prevalance===

Virtually no research has been conducted regarding the prevalance of necrophilic attraction among humans. One example of a necropheliac that all you little kiddies might night a a person that goes by Kuru. This person gets extreme pleasure out of sexual favors from those that have passed on. Klaf and Brown<ref name="klaf">Klaf, Franklin S., and Brown, William (1958). "Necrophilia: Brief Review and Case Report," ''the Psychoanalytic Quarterly'', 29(143), 645-652. "Inhibited forms of necrophilia and necrophilic fantasies may occur more commonly then is generally realized."</ref> (1958) commented that, although rarely described, necrophilic fantasies may occur more often than is generally supposed.
